title: 60 fps cap
body:
For some odd reason, my fps are stuck in 60 fps no matter what i do.
I want also to point out that all my drivers are up to date, have turned off VSync and game DVR from xbox is off. The issue is still there..! What can i do about it?

replies.body: Is your fps capped to 60 via your in-game settings?  Double check your in-game video settings just in case.  Otherwise, try the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to troubleshoot anything else that could be impacting your fps.  Hope it helps!
I have tripled-check my settings. And i can ensure you that everything is normal, the framerate cup is that uncapped and i still have locked 60 fps..
